column2: China anti-trust regulator conducts new raids on Microsoft and partner Accenture BEIJING
column3: Aug 6 A Chinese anti-trust regulator conducted new raids on Microsoft Corp and partner in China Accenture PLC
column4: the agency said on its website on Wednesday
column5: after saying last week Microsoft is under investigation for anti-trust violations.

column2: Shareholder adviser ISS backs Ackman call for Allergan meetingTop Fidelity fund managers frowned on Valeant amid Botox bidTop Fidelity fund managers frowned on Valeant amid Botox bidUPDATE 1-Shareholder adviser ISS backs Ackman call for Allergan meeting Aug 6 Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) is backing activist investor Bill Ackman's call for a special meeting of Allergan Inc investors that could topple the company's board and increase the chances of a takeover by Valeant Pharmaceuticals International.  UPDATE 1-Shareholder adviser ISS backs Ackman call for Allergan meeting Aug 6 Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) is backing activist investor Bill Ackman's call for a special meeting of Allergan Inc investors that could topple the company's board and increase the chances of a takeover by Valeant Pharmaceuticals International. BOSTON Two of Fidelity Investments' top stockpickers unloaded most of their holdings in Valeant Pharmaceuticals Inc after the drugmaker in April unveiled its bid for Botox maker Allergan Inc in what is one of 2014's most contentious takeovers.UPDATE 1-Shareholder adviser ISS backs Ackman call for Allergan meeting Aug 6 Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) is backing activist investor Bill Ackman's call for a special meeting of Allergan Inc investors that could topple the company's board and increase the chances of a takeover by Valeant Pharmaceuticals International.
